magic_missile.name: Magic Missile
magic_missile.cast_message: {caster} launches glowing darts of magical force at {target}!
magic_missile.hit_message: The magic missiles strike unerringly for {damage} force damage!
magic_missile.description: Unerring darts of magical force that always hit their target.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.cast_message: {caster} hurls a ball of flame at {target}!
fireball.hit_message: The fireball explodes for {damage} fire damage!
fireball.description: A massive ball of roaring flame that explodes on impact.

lightning_bolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightning_bolt.cast_message: {caster} calls down a bolt of lightning on {target}!
lightning_bolt.hit_message: The lightning bolt strikes for {damage} lightning damage!
lightning_bolt.description: A crackling bolt of electricity from the heavens.

frost_ray.name: Frost Ray
frost_ray.hit_message: The frost ray freezes {target} for {damage} cold damage!
frost_ray.description: A beam of freezing cold energy.

acid_splash.name: Acid Splash
acid_splash.cast_message: {caster} conjures a burst of acid at {target}!
acid_splash.hit_message: The acid burns for {damage} acid damage!

shadow_bolt.name: Shadow Bolt
shadow_bolt.cast_message: {caster} releases a bolt of shadowy energy at {target}!
shadow_bolt.hit_message: The shadow bolt drains life force for {damage} necrotic damage!
shadow_bolt.description: A bolt of life-draining shadow energy.

heal.name: Heal
heal.description: Restores health with divine or arcane energy.

cure_wounds.name: Cure Wounds
cure_wounds.description: Restores a moderate amount of health.

poison_spray.name: Poison Spray
poison_spray.cast_message: {caster} sprays a cloud of toxic fumes at {target}!
poison_spray.hit_message: The poison cloud deals {damage} poison damage!
poison_spray.description: A noxious cloud of poisonous gas.

eldritch_blast.name: Eldritch Blast
eldritch_blast.cast_message: {caster} fires a beam of crackling eldritch energy at {target}!
eldritch_blast.hit_message: The eldritch blast strikes for {damage} force damage!
eldritch_blast.description: A beam of pure magical force.

sacred_flame.name: Sacred Flame
sacred_flame.hit_message: Sacred flames burn for {damage} radiant damage!
sacred_flame.description: Divine flames that burn the wicked.
